hero_image.title: Hero image - Monitoring strony internetowej
hero_image.description: Minimalistyczna kompozycja workspace z laptopem pokazującym dashboard monitoringu strony
hero_image.alt_text: Laptop z dashboardem monitoringu strony na minimalistycznym biurku w nowoczesnym biurze
hero_image.prompt: Clean minimalist workspace top-down view, laptop displaying website monitoring dashboard with uptime graphs and performance metrics, white wooden desk, smartphone, notebook with yellow pen, coffee cup, natural window lighting, muted colors black white gray with subtle yellow accent, professional business aesthetic, high quality, sharp focus, no people

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Minimalist workspace, natural lighting, professional tech aesthetic with muted colors

section_media.title: Wykres kosztów przestoju strony według wielkości firmy
section_media.description: Wykres słupkowy pokazujący średnie koszty godziny przestoju dla różnych typów firm
section_media.alt_text: Wykres kosztów przestoju strony internetowej - od 8000 zł dla małych firm do 300000 zł dla korporacji
section_media.prompt: Clean bar chart showing website downtime costs by company size, ascending bars from small business to enterprise, values in PLN, professional infographic style, black and gray bars with yellow highlights, white background, minimalist design, clear labels

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Professional chart design with emphasis on cost progression. Use tools like Canva or ChartJS.

section_media.title: Infografika - 5 kluczowych wskaźników monitoringu
section_media.description: Pionowa infografika przedstawiająca kluczowe metryki: uptime, czas ładowania, Core Web Vitals, formularze, płatności
section_media.alt_text: Infografika 5 kluczowych wskaźników monitoringu strony: uptime, szybkość, Core Web Vitals, formularze, płatności
section_media.prompt: Vertical infographic showing 5 key website monitoring metrics: uptime percentage, loading speed stopwatch, Core Web Vitals gauge, forms checkmark, payments shield. Clean icons for each metric, numbered steps 1-5, professional design with black gray white colors and yellow accents, minimalist layout

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Vertical layout with numbered icons, professional tech aesthetic. Canva has excellent KPI templates.

section_media.title: Screenshot interfejsu UptimeRobot
section_media.description: Zrzut ekranu dashboardu UptimeRobot pokazujący monitoring wielu stron
section_media.alt_text: Dashboard UptimeRobot z listą monitorowanych stron i statusem uptime 99.9%
section_media.prompt: Clean UptimeRobot dashboard interface screenshot showing multiple websites being monitored, uptime percentages, green status indicators, professional monitoring tool interface, organized layout with clear metrics

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean software interface, professional monitoring tool aesthetic. Consider creating demo account for authentic screenshot.

section_media.title: Tabela porównawcza narzędzi monitoringu
section_media.description: Porównanie funkcji i cen popularnych narzędzi: UptimeRobot, Pingdom, New Relic
section_media.alt_text: Tabela porównawcza narzędzi monitoringu stron - UptimeRobot, Pingdom, New Relic z cenami i funkcjami
section_media.prompt: Professional comparison table showing monitoring tools (UptimeRobot, Pingdom, New Relic) with features and pricing, clean grid layout, checkmarks for included features, pricing in PLN, minimalist design with black white gray colors and yellow highlights

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean professional table design. Could use Canva comparison templates or create in Google Sheets.

section_media.title: Diagram przepływu - procedura reagowania na awarie
section_media.description: Flowchart pokazujący krok po kroku proces reagowania na wykryty problem
section_media.alt_text: Diagram przepływu procedury reagowania na awarie strony - od alertu do rozwiązania problemu
section_media.prompt: Professional flowchart diagram showing incident response process: alert received → problem assessment → team notification → escalation path → resolution → documentation. Clean arrows connecting steps, decision diamonds, professional process diagram style, black and gray with yellow accents

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Professional process diagram with clear decision points. Tools like Lucidchart or Draw.io work well.

section_media.title: Wykres ROI monitoringu vs koszt awarii
section_media.description: Wykres pokazujący zwrot z inwestycji w monitoring w porównaniu do kosztów awarii
section_media.alt_text: Wykres ROI monitoringu strony - 500% zwrot z inwestycji vs koszty awarii bez monitoringu
section_media.prompt: Professional ROI comparison chart showing monitoring investment vs downtime costs over 12 months, green bars for ROI gains, red bars for potential losses, clear percentage labels, minimalist financial chart design with black gray white and yellow accent colors

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Professional financial chart emphasizing positive ROI. Green for gains, red for costs/losses.
